parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of NextToken.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The ID of the capacity reservation.

parameters.name: PrivatePoolOptions.Id
parameters.description: The token used to start the next query.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Maximum value: 100.

Default value: 10.
